title: Proper Watering
description: Water your plants only when the top inch of soil feels dry. Overwatering can cause root rot.

title: Sunlight Needs
description: Most indoor plants thrive in bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct harsh rays.

title: Fertilizing Routine
description: Use organic fertilizer once a month during the growing season to boost plant health.

title: Humidity Control
description: Many indoor plants love humidity. Mist leaves occasionally or use a humidifier to keep them healthy.
